amendment.description: Amendment sought to reduce the Management of Lands and Resources account by $3 million and increase the funding for urban waters in the Environmental Programs and Management account by a similar amount.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to reduce the Management of Lands and Resources account by $3,000,000 and increase the Environmental Programs and Management account by $3,000,000.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Cleaver amendment (A004) Failed by recorded vote: 165 - 248 (Roll no. 634).
